jcobol.reader
Class CardReader

java.lang.Object
  jcobol.reader.CardReader

public class CardReader
extends java.lang.Object

Read a cobol source program.

Can process fixed format, free format and mixed fixed-free format cobol source program.

readLine

public CobolLine readLine()
                   throws java.io.IOException
Read the next physical line from cobol source program.

a CobolLine instance or null if the end of the stream has been reached.
